metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about order #789456. The tracking hasn't updated in three days and it was supposed to be delivered yesterday. I'm getting really frustrated because I needed this package for a trip I'm taking tomorrow.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand your frustration. Let me look into order #789456 for you. One moment please... Okay, I see here that your package is currently at our regional sorting facility and is experiencing a slight delay due to unforeseen circumstances. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Unforeseen circumstances? That's not very helpful. Can you be more specific? And more importantly, can you guarantee it will arrive before I leave tomorrow morning? Otherwise, it's completely useless to me. What are my options?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay. While I cannot give specific details about the delay, I can offer to expedite the shipping once it leaves the facility, but I am unable to guarantee that it will arrive before your departure tomorrow. I can issue a refund for the shipping costs. Would that be acceptable?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Well, it's not ideal, but I guess a refund for the shipping is something. Yes, please go ahead and do that. And please, make sure it's actually expedited when it leaves the facility. Thank you.
